title.narrative: Malawi Inclusive Eye Health: South West Zone

description.narrative: Our key aim is to prevent avoidable blindness and save the sight of people in South West Malawi.

participating-org.narrative: Federation of Disability Organisations in Malawi (FEDOMA)
Lions Sight First Eye Hospital - Blantyre
